Producer: Michael Almereyda, Fabio Golombek, Aimee Schoof, Isen Robbins, Danny A. Abeckaser, Per Melita
Production Co: Jeff Rice Films, BB Film Productions, Intrinsic Value Films, FJ Productions
Synopsis: In 1961, social psychologist Stanley Milgram (Peter Sarsgaard) conducts controversial experiments designed to measure conformity, conscience and free will.
Title: Experimenter
